title: Market Landscape and Growth Prospects of Japan Smartwatch Industry 2015-2019
text:
(MENAFN Press) FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE Illinois – United States – July 012015 (PR Buzz): Smartwatch Market in Japan 2015-2019  is a new market research publication announced by Reportstack. Smartwatches are computerized watches integrated with enhanced functionalities such as ability to make calls send messages and browse the Internet. These watches are integrated with an OS that can be used across multiple devices. Technological developments in the smartwatch market has enabled ongoing innovations with vendors introducing new features in their products. For example Motorola introduced hands-free and voice command-enabled smartwatches in 2014. 

Such advances in technology have increased the number of applications in smartwatches. Though the market did not grow as expected during 2010-2013 the market landscape will change significantly by 2015 presenting high growth. Regular improvements in design (for some vendors it is a 1-month cycle) shift from hardware to software MNCs acquiring start-ups and steady growth in smartwatches sport watches and fitness trackers are some factors accelerating the market growth.

The analysts forecast that the smartwatch market in Japan to grow at a CAGR of 120.60% in terms of revenue during 2014-2019.

Covered in this Report 
This report covers the present and future scenarios of the smartwatch market in Japan for 2015-2019. To calculate the market size the report considers revenue generated from the sales of smartwatches from various vendors. Smartwatches considered in this report include those that can perform the following functions:
• Make and receive calls or receive notifications regarding the same
• Send and receive text messages or receive notifications regarding the same
• Display time and date

The report Smartwatch Market in Japan 2015-2019 has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the landscape of Smartwatch Market in Japan and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report also includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market.
